metadata.name: Plan JavaFX to Angular Migration
metadata.shortDescription: Phase 0 discovery skill to plan a JavaFX frontend migration to Angular 18 for a specific application repo
metadata.description: Analyze the current JavaFX UI implementation and produce a thorough, discovery-led plan to analyze, design, and execute a migration to an Angular 18 frontend, including an agentic execution approach suitable for AWS Strands (Python).
objectives: Collect key migration inputs and assumptions
Inventory the current JavaFX UI and integration surface
Define a target Angular 18 architecture/design approach
Produce a phased execution plan with risks and success criteria
Outline an agentic implementation approach using AWS Strands (Python)
metadata.author: OLAF Framework

technical_requirements.recommended_llm: Compatible with LLMs that support structured outputs
technical_requirements.tool_dependency: Optional: filesystem read/search tools for repository inspection

prompts.name: plan-javafx-angular-migration
prompts.description: Main prompt for planning a JavaFX to Angular 18 migration (Phase 0 discovery)
